item.title: VBA String Basics
item.description: The String data type represents a series of characters. This topic introduces the basic concepts of strings in Visual Basic.

item.title: VBA Assignment Statements And Operators
item.description: An assignment statement is a VBA statement that assigns the result of an expression to a variable or an object.

item.title: VBA Arrays
item.description:
Most programming languages support arrays. An array is a group of variables that share a common name.

You refer to a specific variable in the array by using the array name and an index number in parentheses.

item.title: VBA Functions
item.description:
A function essentially performs a calculation and returns a single value.

The SUM function in MS Excel returns the sum of a range of values.
